reviews.comments: Depto muy lindo y bien ubicado. Sin dudas regresariamos.

Facundo un excelente anfitrión. Muy flexible con nuestro horario de llegada y partida. El monoambiente no es muy grande pero tiene todo lo necesario. Linda zona. Cama comoda. Puede mejorar el mantenimiento de la pintura y mobiliario del sector dormitorio que esta un poco desgastado.
Muy lindo departamento y cómodo, bien ubicado. Facundo excelente, muy buen anfitrión.
Excelente anfitrión Facundo, muy atento a todo... La zona muy tranquila. Totalmente recomendable.

Apartamento muy bien equipado, se nota que Facundo le interesa que sus huéspedes se sientan cómodos y con todo lo necesario. Se ha preocupado por ofrecer una propiedad de calidad y perfectamente limpia. Esta muy bien ubicada en Palermo y Facundo fue muy amable tanto antes, durante y al momento de la partida. Todo funcionó correctamente y merece las excelentes calificaciones que ha recibido. Da gusto encontrar tan buena predisposición, esfuerzo por ofrecer calidad y a un precio justo. El edificio y el barrio es muy tranquilo y seguro. Todas las fotos y lo publicado fue respetado coincidiendo exactamente y superando lo esperado. Gracias por todo y felicitaciones!
Todo muy bueno! excelente ubicacion y departamento, muy comodo y recomendable!

Facundo fue muy cordial y agil. El departamento se encontraba en exelente estado... y en una inmejorable ubicación.... 
Nos sentimos seguro por el movimiento de gente a toda hora... 
Muy recomendable .!!!
El departamento era tal cual lo descripto y mostrado en las fotos. Estaba todo en excelente estado.  Facundo una persona muy amable y super adaptable a mis horarios.
Todo lindo

Muy buen departamento, facundo fue muy amable y nos informó muy bien sobre las actividades en Buenos Aires.

Lo recomiendo
El departamento es bastante cómodo y tiene muy buena ubicación, Facundo siempre nos ayudó y estuvo pendiente
Excelente ubicación, anfitrión y lugar. Muy limpio, cómodo, todo está pensado y muy buen precio.
Cómodo apartamento en zona muy buena. Muy buen trato dispensado por parte de Facundo
Muy bien!
espacio cómodo para dos personas y central. Información clara y departamento limpio

Un apartamento bien ubicado en una buena zona de Buenos Aires bien comunicado y con muchos restaurantes y tiendas alrededor. El apartamento tiene lo básico para pasar una buena estancia y Facundo lo hizo todo fácil esperándonos a la llegada a pesar de que era tarde. Al regresar a Buenos Aires repetimos en su apartamento.

Esta fue mi primera vez con Airbnb y la verdad me temo que Facundo y este apartamento dejaron el listón sumamente alto. El apartamento es exactamente como se ve en las fotos. Cómodo, lindo, muy bien iluminado, limpio y sumamente completo. 
La ubicación es absolutamente ideal. Muy bien comunicado con las líneas de subte, cerca de muchos cafés, bares, restaurantes, y súpermercados entre otros. 
Facundo es un anfitrión espectacular. Me recibió, me ubico, me contó cómo llegar a varios sitios. No solo eso si no que se aseguró de que el apartamento tuviera todo lo que yo necesitaba para que mi llegada a Buenos Aires fuera lo más agradable posible. Definitivamente les recomiendo este apartamento!
El apartamento tal y como se describe, acogedor y limpio. Situado en Palermo, en una zona encantadora y tranquila para disfrutar buenos aires. Facundo superamable y servicial. 100%recomendable
Muy bien ubicado y equipado el apartamento. No hemos encontrado a Facundo pero era muy comunicativo con nosotros antes, durante y después de nuestra estancia en Buenos Aires. Muy recomendable.

La experiencia con Facundo en Buenos Aires ha sido excepcional. Nos vino a recibir en el mismo puerto donde llegamos. Nos facilitó todas las informaciones y nos sugirió muchas cosas! El apartamento es ideal para una pareja: moderno, curioso, funcional y bien ubicado en una zona con multitud de posibilidades. No podriamos estar mejor!

El piso está muy bien, es tal cual aparece en las fotos de la página. Facundo fue super amable y estuvo todo el tiempo pendiente de nosotros. Es una muy buena opción para una pareja de visita en Buenos Aires. Muy recomendable.

Una gran experiencia! Facundo desde el principio estuvo atento a mis consultas y dispuesto a ayudar para que mi estadía sea excelente. El dpto posee todas las comodidades y el anfitrión cuida todos detalles. El lugar está muy bien ubicado y la zona es segura. En mi próxima visita volvería sin lugar a dudas.

Todo correcto en general.
Facundo ha sido muy amable y atento y el apartamento tal y como se describe. 
Un plus la maquina de cafe.
El barrio es muy agradable y tranquilo con muchos locales y buen ambiente

Nuestra estadía se resume en una palabra: EXCELENTE! El apartamento es divino, la ubicación esta genial y Facundo es un anfitrión super atento, apenas tuvimos el más mínimo problema enseguida respondió! Hasta el más minimo detalle esta considerado, desde adaptador hasta las tarjetas SUBE. Las recomendaciones de Facundo también son fantásticas, hicimos el bicitour y cenamos en La Cabrera, todo de 10! Muchas gracias Facundo!!

El departamento es exactamente como en las fotos. Fue super fácil a interactuar con Facundo y ofreció ayuda por todo. La ubicación del depto es bien, hay restaurantes, tiendas, colectivos y la estación del subte cerca. Usamos la terraza común para hacer asado dos veces y funcionó todo muy bien. Es muy recomendable. Gracias Facundo, siempre de nuevo :)

Una experiencia genial. Facundo y su familia nos recibieron con mucha amabilidad y nos facilitaron datos para disfrutar de nuestra estadía. El apartamento es tal cual se aprecia en las fotos, muy cómodo, limpio, y su ubicación es muy buena, tranquila y cerca de todo. Esperamos volver pronto.

Gran espacio para recorrer lo mejor de Buenos Aires. Súper localización y cercano a restaurantes, bares y tiendas. El departamento está en muy buenas condiciones y tiene todo lo necesario. Gran anfitrión, nos ayudó con recomendaciones y tips para disfrutar más nuestra visita. Muy recomendable lugar!!

Todo súper bien, el apartamento como se ve en las fotos, full internet y televisión por cable, muy bien ubicado, cerca de la línea de subte d, avenida santa fe y en 20 minutos estábamos en la casa rosada.

Facundo es muy atento y puntual. El departamento esta en una zona super animada y bien ubicada para todos los puntos de interes de la ciudad. Sin duda vamos a volver y a quedarnos mas dias para poder aprovecharlo aun mas!

Muy buena experiencia, el departamento se encuentra en buen estado y cuenta con todo lo necesario para pasar unos días en Buenos Aires. Facundo me recibió personalmente y fue muy amable y preciso con sus indicaciones.

Lindo departamento! Mi novia y yo lo pasamos muy bién. Está muy bien ubicado en Palermo, cerca de todo que necesitamos: metro, estación de bici, buenos bares y restaurantes!
Facundo nos facilitó un mobile de Argentina y fue muy amable y atencioso.
Seguramente, cuando volver a Buenos Aires, me quedo "At Facundo's place"!

Es un lugar muy muy agradable, el apartamento es muy lindo y acogedor, esta muy bien equipado, nos gusto mucho... La zona perfecta, cerca de restaurantes para probar la rica comida Argentina... Es cerca del metro.. Y de Buenos Aires ESPECTACULAR! Lo recomiendo!
reviews.response:
Ningún problema Carolina!!!! Guardalo así ya están preparados para su próxima visita!!!!!

Saludos

reviews.comments: El apartamento muy confortable y limpio !! Facundo muy buena onda flexible con horarios !! Muy recomendable !

Facundo fue un excelente host, mas allá de que el departamento estaba muy limpio y tal cual como lo presentó, me sorprendió de buena manera los detalles adicionales de Facundo, como dejar un celular para el huesped y tarjetas de subte/bus, ambos elementos increiblemente útiles para el viajero y que Facundo tuvo la amabilidad de incluirlos. 
El departamento en sí es muy comodo, excelente ubicación. Seguro volvería a usarlo en mi próxima estadia en Buenos Aires. Muy recomendado.
El alojamiento cumplió todas nuestras expectativas y Facundo es un excelente anfitrión; nos proporcionó todo lo que necesitábamos para nuestra estadía.

Nuestra estadía en el apto de Facundo fue genial!! Es un departamento sumamente confortable y funcional. Adoramos el lugar, todo estaba nuevo e impecable, tal cual aparece en las fotos publicadas.
Facundo fue un anfitrión excelente, super amable y cuidadoso de cada detalle.
El  barrio Palermo Hollywood es fantástico, ofrece una gama amplia y buenísima de restaurants y bares y a la vez conserva la tradición de barrio de calles empedradas llenas de árboles.
Sin duda nos quedaremos de nuevo ahí cuando volvamos a Bs As y recomendaremos el departamento a nuestros amigos!

La estancia en el departamento fue magnífica,tiene todas las comodidades y está muy limpio y bien ubicado.Incluye móvil y tarjeta sube, muy útil para aquellos que vengan a visitar la ciudad. Facundo es muy amable y servicial.
Recomiendo 100%.

I stayed with a friend at Facundo's place for 1 week and we regret nothing. The apartment is just as lovely as you see in the pics, and it has pretty much everything you need. The best part though was Facundo's great hosting! He makes sure everything's fine and you can ask him for anything you need. He was very polite.

In the apartment there were maps with some marked hotspots that Facundo left for us, which can be found really useful. Also a SUBE card (a transportation card you use to pay for the bus, Subway and train rides around buenos aires) and even a cellphone with a local number!! And he left some restaurant suggestions for us to go eat (with a discount card, awesome)

The neighborhood, in my opinion, is one of the best choices if you want to stay in Buenos Aires. You'll find a big part of the local life in there. It's full of restaurants, parks, bars and clubs (if you want to experience some of the nightlife too).
You're a few blocks away from two big avenues which have buses that go north and south (Av. Santa Fe) and east and west (Av. Juan B Justo). Also really close to a Subway station and a train station, which can be really useful.

Thank you Facundo, our stay was great and you helped a lot!! We would choose this place again!
Facundo's place was very good: clean, bright and well-equipped. It was also surprisingly quiet. We would stay again.

From the beggining Facundo was easy to reach and talk to. 
Very open to change the time of arrival at the apartment so I could leave my syuff and continue with my day!
There were Buenos Aires guides inside, a public transportation card ready to be used and suggestions on how to move around the city!

The apartment was Perfect ! 
Everything was in perfect state, clean and exactly as you see it in the photos!
The location was great! Tons of restaurants and bars near by as well as metro stations and many buses.

I really recommended for one person or a couple who want to have a great vacation in Buenos Aires!
De buurt was geweldig dichtbij de bars en het winkelgebied. Het appartement voldeed aan onze eisen en was hetzelfde als op de fotos. Facu was aardig en hielp ons indien nodig, zeker een aanrader.

Facundo was a fantastic host. His apartment is wonderfully well kept with all new appliances, and he was extremely welcoming and accommodating. He was happy to work with our schedules to move in and out, and was extremely nice overall. I highly recommend booking with Facundo!
The appartment was great! It has everything you'll need and more... Facundo is such a great host, he helped me in every way he could! Gracias pana!
Facundo’s studio is perfectly located in the heart of Palermo. Very clean, nicely equiped and super communication in between parts. Will definitely suggest it to friends!

Appartement idéal pour découvrir Buenos Aires !!! Emplacement parfait près du métro et commerces en bas de l’immeuble ! De plus Facundo a été tres réactif lorsque nous avions des questions. Nous recommandons.

Facundo is an excellent host! He gave us some great recommendations for places to eat in Palermo and was very quick in his responses. The apartment is as advertised and in a wonderful neighborhood close to restaurants, markets, and nightlife, while at the same time very quiet and peaceful (on the fifth floor, away from street noise). The kitchenware provided made it easy to whip up quick meals as well. 
Overall, our stay was a wonderful experience. We would recommend Facundo and is apartment to anybody traveling to Buenos Aires!
Facundo é um excelente anfitrião. O apartamento é ótimo e muito bem localizado
Melhor localização impossível; o apartamento é ótimo e Facundo é extremamente prestativo.

Facundo's apartment is great! It is close to many restaurants and bars and walking distance to public transportation. Facundo is very easy to communicate with and overall it was a great experience, I would recommend!
I had a great stay here. Location is great, apartment is great, service is great. Apartment as shown in pictures. I really enjoyed my stay here. Recommended!

Facundo was a great and thoughtful host. His place is stylish and fully equipped for a long stay. The location is great and walking distance to restaurants, subway, parks etc. We enjoyed the large balcony for the view and people watching. We highly recommend this place in Buenos Aires.

Wonderful affordable studio for three nights in Buenos Aires! Palermo was a great neighborhood to stay in with easy access to the metro, wonderful restaurants, and running routes to beautiful parks. Facundo was very accommodating, professional and has excellent communication skills. Would definitely recommend to friends!

We had a very nice stay at Facundo’s place in Palermo.  It is close to several shops and restaurants, but about a 10-15 min walk to a bigger concentration of bars, restaurants, and cafes that are a few blocks after you cross a bit larger boulevard that’s not far from the apartment.  Palermo is bigger than we anticipated, but overall still walkable.  Building felt safe/secure.  Facundo was a great host- helped us out with some of our trip plans that were changing, and let us keep our bags in the apartment after check out because we had a late flight.  Overall a positive experience.

The studio is well located in Palermo Hollywood, a bi more calm than soho. Bars and Restaurants are all around. 10 minutes wañk to Palermo station. 
Facundo is a great host, always open to support. Wifi is top. 
Would go there again!

It is very convenient and close to restaurants and bars. Facundo is a great host. His respond time is fast and solves the problems immediately. I recommend it to everyone who wants to stay in a studio.

The apartment was awesome, there is nothing to criticise. It was perfectly clean, big and modern, just like on the pictures. The check-in went well, Facundo was really friendly and gave us some really good advice for what to do in Buenos Aires, also he was always contactable via message. The apartment is located in Palermo which is in my opinion the most beautiful neighborhood of the city. I would always book Facundo's apartment again and I can recommend it to anyone visiting Buenos Aires.
O apartamento é otimo. Bem localizado. Cama confortável. O Facundo é nota 10. Recomendo. :)
Facundo foi muito prestativo, simpático e acolhedor. Tivemos problemas no aquecedor de água e logo ele resolveu. Nossa estadia foi ótima. Voltaria com certeza.
Tolle Lage und toller Gastgeber! Alles tadellos! Werde bestimmt wieder kommen!
Absolutely a must.  Friendly host, great location.  Clean, safe, and tons of great restaurants around.

Bom apartamento. Ótima localização. Rua relativamente tranquila em um bairro super bem localizado que possui tudo que se precisa, tanto em relação a comércio, restaurantes, bares, etc. quanto a deslocamento para qualquer ponto de Buenos Aires.
Prime location close to all the nightlife. Facundo is very communicative and available

Facundo is an awesome host - he waited for me for a late arrival check in! He'll tell you where everything is located and be available for any questions. The place was great! It as a good feeling about it is in a great location - Thanks Facundo!

Facundo's apartment was the perfect stay! Clean, neat, equipped, close to shops, and with everything I needed. 
The apartment itself has everything you need and more. Spacious and with great natural light and also screens if you want to keep it dark and sleep in. 
Comfortable bed and great furniture all around. Great wifi for getting work done and a good table to work and eat from.

The balcony and the laundry machine were a great plus! :) 

The kitchen is super equipped and the coffee machine was a life saver! 

Facundo, as a host, was fenomenal!! He went above and beyond to make me feel at home and to accommodate to my schedule. 

I would totally come back and stay here again and would totally recommend it to anyone staying in Buenos Aires.

The apartment is in a great location to explore Buenos Aires. Close to the metro and the area itself has so many nice cafes, restaurants and bars that you don't need to go too far on an evening.

Facundo was a great host and gave us lots of info about the city and even left us a metro card to use.

The apartment is nice and well equipped.

I had an awesome stay at Facundo's place! Fortunately, he was able to accomodate my last minute booking and within a few hours I could check into his lovely apartment.

Location is great, very close to a ton of bars/clubs, restaurants, grocery stores, public transportation and sites. I am a single woman and felt safe walking home from the bars/restaurants at night.

The apartment itself was just like the photos: clean, spacious, well-equipped with toiletries, coffee/tea, washing machine, a very hand metro card, etc.

As a host, Facundo went above and beyond to make sure I felt welcomed in his apartment and in Buenos Aires. He told me about a Polo match in Palermo that was happening during my stay and because of him I was able to see Argentina vs Uruguay, a great opportunity that I would not have known about. He also recommended some restaurants and other must dos while in BA and always was very quick to respond to any questions I had. I can totally understand why he's a Super Host!

If you want to be in a happening area and be comfortable during your time in BA, then definitely book Facundo's apartment!

Facundo is a super host for a reason, And I discovered why. 
He provided a prepaid cell phone ( I didn't need but it is terrific gesture) and more importantly a subway card and a map.
He was most helpful with questions.

A localização do espaço é ótima, no bairro Palermo, numa rua bastante tranquila e próxima de pontos de movimento e de cafés e restaurantes. A alguns quarteirões está o acesso à Av Santa Fe e a pontos de transporte público. É próximo o bastante dos bosques de Palermo para ir caminhando até lá e é uma região muito bonita da cidade. 

Não tem armários no local. Para mim não foi inconveniente pois fiquei poucos dias, mas para uma estadia de mais tempo, acredito que seria um pouco desconfortável. Mas há ferro de passar disponível, então ajuda. 
Facundo esteve lá para me receber mesmo antes do horário estabelecido para check in e guardou minhas malas até meu horário de partida, pois meu voo seria tarde. 
Ele respondeu a todas as dúvidas e mensagens com rapidez, gentileza e precisão. É um lugar que eu recomendaria a amigos.

Excelente localização com várias opções de bares e restaurantes. Metrô a poucas quadras. Apartamento confortável, exatamente como está na foto. Facundo é um ótimo anfitrião flexibilizou tanto o check in quanto o check out e deixou um telefone para ligações locais além de nos demonstrar em um guia um  mapa com informações turísticas na chegada.

Facundo was a wonderful host - we had great communication throughout, and he answered any questions we had as it was our first time in Argentina. Unfortunately, my jacket (with our apartment keys in it!) got stolen in another neighborhood, and Facundo helped us out late at night to get back into the apartment... like a total angel.

The apartment itself was clean, in a wonderful location, with great features like a blender and a washing machine. The balcony had a great above-treetop view, and was close to great coffee shops and restaurants.

I would recommend Facundo's place to anyone looking to stay in Buenos Aires :)
This place was amazing! Would recommended it to all visiting Buenos Aires. Facundo was incredibly helpful and very nice!

Facundo's apartment in Palermo was just what I needed for a few days of rest before international travel. The location was great, the wifi was fast, and the view from the balcony is mostly trees :) Loved it. The apartment is very much like the pictures, and is better set up for travelers than most - with things like a subway card, an Argentine cell phone, and power adapters, if you need these things. Nice touch. Communication was great too. Thanks Facundo!
Don't lock yourself on the balcony!

Facundo's apt is located in Palermo a fantastic neighbourhood for bars and restaurants. It's a short walk to the Palmero subway station (subway is called "Subte" in BA). Facu is a wonderful host and ensure I had everything to make my stay as easy as possible including a card for the subway, a local mobile phone, info for safe taxis and even discounts to local restaurants. 
Would definitely stay here again!

This is a great place to stay a couple of days. It has a great location in town, tidy and clean and then there is also the very friendly Facundo who takes time to explain the city and what  there is to do. We had a very pleasant stay here.
Facundo was a great host, answered all our questions and had everything we needed to enjoy our stay in BA. I highly recommend!

I was so happy to find that apartment in Buenos Aires. It's located in very active and bohemic neighborhood. Here you may find a lot of cafes, restaurants, clubs. Facundo is the best owner, extremely hospitable and nice. I hadn't any problems with late check-in and check-out. In apartment you can find everything you need

Facundo was kind enough to let us check in early as our flight came in at 9 am. The location was amazing. Tons of restaurants and bars. Comfortable to walk around. Not necessarily close to tourist areas but taxis are cheap and easy to get. Apartment is great for a couple. The AC was good, but sometimes not strong enough. Although we didn't use them, the local phone and subte cards were great. The converter was a life saver. Overall, our stay was amazing and would absolutely stay again.
excellent location & cool view from the balcony !

Neighborhood was perfect! Close to restaurants and bars. Facundo was very easy to get in touch with when we had questions about arrival/departure. If I'm back in BA soon, I would definitely stay here again.

Our experience at Facundo's was very good. The apartment is small, clean and functional, has the much needed AC, and is in a great neighborhood. Facundo provided a useful Lonely Planet, power converters and a public transport card.
We had a little glitch at the beginning as we arrived earlier than he expected. However other than that communication was prompt and efficient. The apartment is not suited for cooking much beyond the simplest meals, which for us was not an issue due to mostly eating out.

Perfect apartment for getting around palermo - close to the subte and buses. Facundo is a super host and was so helpful with tips and suggestions for our stay and answered any questions we had. Would highly recommend this accomodation! Thanks again.
Eu e meu marido ficamos 3 dias no apartamento de Facuando, amamos o local, o ape e apesar de não ter garagem foi super fácil estacionar o carro bem em frente. Super recomendo!

Very nice place for one person or a couple. Close to lot of restaurants and bars. Host was very nice and communicates instantly which is really great. Provided a preloaded phone to use. House has all the necessary things that any traveller would need. I would definitely rent this place again. Don't think twice, you can just rent it if you are coming to buenos aires.
Very friendly and kind host, good location, cute apartment with everything you need. Thanks Facundo!
Nice choice if you like breakfast in balcony, barbeque with the sunset on the rooftop.

Facundo was very accommodating as we had a late arrival and early departure. Located in a great part of town. Lots of restaurants and bars nearby as well as a subway stop. Apartment was perfect and had everything that we needed. Definitely recommend staying with Facundo!

Facundo is AMAZING. From check in, he was so generous and helpful, collecting us from our previous place and helping us with our luggage to the apartment. On the day of check out, with lots of luck, we were able to leave our luggage in the apartment until we had to head for the airport. These things are HUGE sources of stress when travelling, and Facundo managed to eliminate all of those issues. The place is superbly located, with buses going all around it, and the subway being reasonably close to get you to any point in Buenos Aires that you could wish. Facundo was always available for us, and for our needs (even dashing back for us when we thought we had lost the house key!! :S) and was ever so gentlemanly with everything he did. The house was spacious for 2, and little details like the Cable TV, a mobile for our use to contact him, and the well equipped kitchen - and the washing machine was a BLESSING for us! - were noticed. We really enjoyed our month here, and it really was super sad for us to leave. The vege shop on Bonpland almost right across from the apartment is amazing - do check it out. Facundo, gracias por todo - sos lo mejor, y te deseo lo mas en el futuro con AirBnB y lo demas. Hasta pronto!!! :)

Absolutely perfect location! We felt extremely safe and were close to tons of restaurants and bars. We especially loved the balcony and the Nespresso machine that was stocked with multiple flavors of coffee. Facundo was extremely responsive and helpful from the start of our booking until the end of our stay. We would 100% recommend staying here as well as would love the opportunity to come back!

O apartamento é muito bom, bem localizado, limpo e com tudo o que você precisa. O Facundo é um ótimo anfitrião. Ele nos deixo um celular com um chip local, cartão de metro, um mapa da cidade, além de um pequeno guia com ótimos restaurantes. Recomendo muito!

Facundo was a great host and made our stay in Buenos Aires so much easier. From meeting us early morning to hand is the keys to taking the time to explain everything we needed to know about the apartment and how to get around in BA and giving us great recommendations. He was quick to reply whenever we had questions and concerns. And the apartment itself is well located. We honestly couldn't have asked for a better host!

Facundo foi um anfitriao excelente, atencioso, prestativo e muito gente boa. Nos recebeu e com muita paciencia nos mostrou mapas e sugeriu programacoes. O apartamento é otimo, muito bem localizado e confortavel. Adoramos a experiencia e super recomendamos o lugar!

We absolutely fell in love with Facundo's place. Located in the heart of Palermo! Walking distance to lots of cafes, restaurants, bars and metro. He was extremely helpful and always in touch with us whenever we needed him. He left a Metro card and an adapter which saved our lives :))) We are already planning our next trip to Buenos Aires and hope that Facundo's place will be available again.

Facundo is a hugely accommodating, friendly, and helpful host. His apartment is perfect for a stay in BA. A great location in Palermo close to good restaurants and the metro station. The place is a good size and everything that you might need is provided and works very well, including the wifi, washing machine, shower, and provision of kitchenware. Would definitely recommend to all!

Super! Facundo très accueillant, disponible, donne de bons conseils. Flexible, nous accueilli plus tot que prevu et nous a laissé partir en lui remettant les clefs dans la boîte aux lettres en toute confiance.

L appart était tout à fait ce qui était annoncé , propre, suffisant pour notre petit séjours, fonctionnel et proche du quartier vivant.

Sans hésitation, rapport qualité prix très bon.

I see why Facundo is a Super Host: He communicates clearly and offers extra things that are very helpful. After showing us the place he spent some extra time going over how to get around, and what to see in Buenos Aires. He also provided a cell phone, Sube (bus & subway system) card, washing machine with drying rack, and a Nespresso machine. These seemed like small things in the listing description, but the convenience they provided each day made our time in Buenos Aires much more relaxed and comfortable. (For example, many airport taxi services and restaurants require a local number for reservations. Important!)

As for the studio itself, it was ideal for our weeklong stay: spacious, full kitchen, and located a short walk from public transport and many interesting neighborhoods.

Overall, staying with Facundo was a great way to see Buenos Aires.
Great experience with Facundo. He was a good host.

The experience in Facundo's apartment was very nice, he was there in the moment of our arrival, very polite and helpful he took some time to show us our location (very good located), how was the transportation in the city and places to visit. The apartment is what you see in the pictures, a clean loft, with all the needs for a good stay, washer machine, A/C or heating. 
Facundo thinks in the guest needs, he had a cellphone and transportation card in case we need it. I recommend this apartment for couples or persons who wants to come to Buenos Aires.

Facundo is the best host you can ever imagine. Always ready to answer all your questions and if necessary arranging everything for you in person! His studio is brilliantly located in a nice neighbourhood in Palermo with lots of restaurants and night life available. If you like to explore the beautiful city of Buenos Aires Facundo offers a Subte card and a local mobile phone in case you get lost and for other emergencies. You can also perfectly stay at home and relax on the balcony or watching a movie. The kitchen offers anything you need for cooking, you have an easy to use washing machine for doing your laundry. Grocery stores are around the corner. The bathroom is fully equipped with everything you might need (e.g. blow-dryer). The WLAN provided is excellent. The experience of Facundo's hearty hospitality will make it hard to leave!
